name: Elemental (itch) (Indi227, FantasiA1, Jawn12345, jp5169)
description:
In a world full of slimes, angry cats, and evil witches... do you have what it takes to become a masterful mage?

Brave the elements as you travel in search of powerful spells to use against the evil Witch.

Use A and D to move, Space bar to jump, and left/right click to use spells. Use number keys 1-4 to cycle between spells to use.

All sprites, animations, and music are original. Sound effects were open source.

Links to the sound effects:

1. Player Death

  • Freesound - "Death is your only escape.wav" by carmsie

2. Wind Shield

  • Freesound - "Pop.wav" by ThompsonMan

3. Healing

  • Freesound - "Retro game heal sound" by lulyc

4. Player Jump

  • Freesound - "Jump_C_04" by cabled_mess
